data.he: Once upon a time, in a vast savanna, there lived a young giraffe named Gerald. He loved to explore and was always on the lookout for new adventures. One day, while on one of his adventures, he stumbled upon a necklace of magical beads.
data.she: Once upon a time, in a vast savanna, there lived a young giraffe named Gia. She was always curious and loved to explore the savanna and its many wonders. One day, as she was wandering around, she came across a beautiful necklace of magical beads.
